LanguageData.MakeSugar.label: 榨制甘蔗
LanguageData.MakeSugar.description: Beat and grind those canes to get at that sugar! Produces 3.
LanguageData.MakeFlour.label: 磨制面粉
LanguageData.MakeFlour.description: Grind wheat, corn, rice or oats into flour. Produces 6.
LanguageData.CraftCornmeal.label: 磨制玉米粉
LanguageData.Makesoymilk.label: 榨制豆浆
LanguageData.Makesoymilk.description: Press beans into soy milk. Produces 4.
LanguageData.MakeChocolate.label: 制作巧克力
LanguageData.MakeChocolate.description: Roast cocoa beans and sugar to 制造 chocolate, a sweet treat. Produces 5.
LanguageData.MakeCaramel.label: 制作焦糖
LanguageData.MakeCaramel.description: Turns sugar into a caramel snacks. Produces 3.
LanguageData.MakeBread.label: 烤面包
LanguageData.Makecheese.label: 制作芝士
LanguageData.Makecheese.description: Turns milk or soy milk into cheese. Produces 4.
